column5: When would you's guess there would be ice at pier 4 park in hamilton , binbrook or puslinch lake?
not for a while yet im thinking January at the earliest
DANG, that's what I was going to say...
no ice this year boys ...sorry i had to cancel it due to the extended indian summer i have in the works right now....
If you're dancing up a storm, just keep it up, the less I have to shovel the happier my back is.
I'd bet even David Phillips wouldn't hazard a guess on that.
As long as it's after Nov 30th, I don't care & I'm sure we don't have to worry about that, bring on the SMALLIES Richard
Second week of January would be nice, that way I can get some good steelheading in when I visit my folks at Christmas.
When it gets cold enough I would think ?
we;re gonna be floating in january this year.. water is still so warm
Seems like January? It has been a little warmer but then again. I say roll on global warming!!
Hey Mark...That is a strange lookin' carp in your avatar !  Did you get it on a hair rig ? What ground bait were you using?...
Guessing 3rd weekend of January...for safe ice that is...6"+
Ice fishing derby at binbrook in feb,I just hope the ice can make an apperence.I think its goin to iffy for the jiffy.
Ice??????? can we get some snow and cold,,,,,,,PLEASE.
Wouldn't be the first time I was jigging from my boat on ice opener!! Its a heck of a lot easier to cover water, that's for sure!!  My boat will be ready.  S.
